english.segment1: Enough of the fighting. Day after day. Ive hit the wall. Trying to live my way. Ive been running. Im wearing thin. This is where I stop. And where you begin
english.segment2: Chorus. I surrender. I lie down. I give up. Enough of the bleeding. My chest hurts
english.segment3: From all this digging. Under my dirt. Im in a struggle. Tearing me apart. Is this just madness?. Or the changing of my heart?
english.segment5: Bridge: Into your arms I crumble. Into your arms I crawl. Into your arms I stumble. Letting go you catch my fall
